"Xiandy": "Thank you for coming. Allow me to introduce myself."
"I am Xiandy. I'm currently researching the strange phenomenon occuring across Halpha."
"The reason I've called you here is to aid me by investigating this phenomenon."
"Halpha's air temperature has not varied significantly throughout the last year, but it has seen a drop in this particular season."
"A potential consequence of this is the color shift certain trees seem to have undergone."
"I would like your help in investigating this and other such anomalies."
"To begin with... Could you collect some Gathering samples that only appear during this season?"
"I've prepared some special rewards for all who provide assistance."
"Well then, I'll leave it to you."
"Thank you for coming."
"I would like to ask for your cooperation once more for our investigations..."
"I've prepared some special rewards for all who provide assistance."
"Well then, I'll leave it to you."
"Welcome back. You've gathered so much data!"
"With this, I'll be able to study the source of this temperature drop and its influence on the ecosystem and our foes."
"During your investigations, I was contacted by someone from another department and gave them your name."
"They may also have a request for you. Should they ask, please offer them your assistance as well."
"Thank you for your help."
"Points can be exchanged for rewards. Please let me know if you require anything."
"I hope you will continue to aid us."
"We are eagerly investigating the cause of the temperature drop."
"Any small bit of data you can offer will help us."
